reviews.review: FROZEN II, while nowhere close to the first, is still an overall decent movie, and has gorgeous animation, excellent voice acting, great music (Into The Unknown is gonna play a lot now. Parents, brace yourselves), some terrific animated sequences--watch out for a scene involving Elsa and a horse--and retains much of the first one's charm and sisterhood qualities to just about make up for its very thin storytelling.
Very good - even for parents!! Not too long and lots of music!
It was such a great movie, had jokes for kids and adults. Me and my cousin think it is even better then the fist one. If you like frozen one you will love this one. Also it hits you in the feels
it was really good... plus my daughter is gona love it when she watch's it.
It was a good film but first one is still better but it good anyways go see it.

I was sorely disappointed with the movie, there was no real villain, the plot was weak. There was way to much singing. Kristoff proposed to Anna but there was no wedding!! How could they leave that out?! That could have been a nice way to end. And why not address Elsa's love life or not; introduce a new characters with the same powers as her she falls in love with or something. For how long they were working on this, they could have done SO much better. The chameleon should have been introduced in the beginning instead of halfway towards the end since it was so cute and Elsas companion. The best part of the movie was Olaf's joke! I hope they make a Frozen 3 and introduce a boyfriend or girlfriend for Elsa and a wedding for Kristoff. And than Anna has a baby. Something should happen to one of the main characters, even Olaf they have to rescue and there should be a villain. It could even be the big snowman kidnapping Olaf or something. And Elsa should make Olaf and girlfriend and call her Samantha!  . I hope someone important reads this and agrees...
Great movie just as good as the first.
Gorgeous animation and catchy songs, but a convoluted story prevents it from reaching the heights of the first. Your kids will love it.
it was amazing and sad. Must watch.
